aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Bj√∂rn ten Eicken, a front-end developer from near Remscheid, Germany. I have always been interested in IT technology in the field of web and so I decided to specialize in Angular and Javascript. I have gained a lot of experience in the last year by creating many projects and I am sure I can help you with my experience in your company.
